body.p:
To His Excellency Thos E Bramlette
Gov of the State of Kentucky

Under the provisions of the Revised Statutes Chap 28 sec 22 on the petition of the County Judge or Circuit Judge of the County, You are authorized to issue a proclamation and offer a reward in aggravated cases of murder and other felonies against the person when the accused shall flee from Justice, I therefore as Judge of the Woodford County Court respectfully petition Your Excellency to offer a reward for the apprehension of the persons described in the accompanying paper herewith, They from all the information I can gather on or about the 19th day of August ^past^ within this county Robbed and assaulted in an aggravated manner Benja Martin an Old man and Fantly Johnson both respectable Citizens of the County and having done so fled from Justice and are now at liberty,
W. J. Steele P. J. W. C. C

$750
Reward
Woodford Co
Thos Jenkins
Anthony Smith & John Bishop
Reward $250
each
3rd Sept /65
Reward increased on the 6th inst to $500, each
